snippet: For the first time since Typhoon Haiyan struck the Philippines, aerial views are showing the extent of the damage in some parts of the country, cut off because of downed communication lines.
abstract: For the first time since Typhoon Haiyan struck the Philippines, aerial views are showing the extent of the damage in some parts of the country, cut off because of downed communication lines.

headline.main: Aerial Views of Devastation in the Philippines
